questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A serene body of water
C) A crowded marketplace
D) An indoor activity

A) A large building
B) A person on a boat
C) A group of people
D) A statue

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Trees and a grassy area
C) Buildings
D) The ocean

A) A sandy beach
B) A forest trail

A) A sailboat
